name: GameBreak - Playable Teaser
description:
GameBreak is a 2D Puzzler about hacking into a videogame and cheating in order to defeat the evil A.I! You have to use the in-game terminal to input text-based commands and 'cheat' by increasing your jump or changing the gravity to finish each level.

This is the teaser with only two levels unlocked, the full game will be shown at Bucharest Gaming Week on the 8th and 9th of December and will also be made available here for free on the same date!

You can check out our FaceBook page for more updates!

Our Team:

-Andreea Hompoth (art)

-Andrei Tache (programing & game design)

-Andreea Oprescu (game design)

-Ioan Dan Condurateanu (business)

-Teodor Mihalcea (story)

-Marius Tanase (business)

-Tony Frum (programing)
